cons: The current administration is more worried about image and pays very little attention to requiring the students to be accountable for their actions. The students are in charge and can manipulate the staff, drug and alcohol issues are frequently brushed aside.

job_title: Student Assistant in Sioux City, IA
pros: Reasonable hours. Easy work once learned. Get to work alone and with someone. Learn about the financial aid process. Will receive a small gift card for Christmas.
cons: Repetitive. Long hours during FAFSA season. Be prepared for lots of paper cuts. Can be very boring since main duties are entering information into the database.
